alert.note: Alert for Espanola Valley; Far Northwest Highlands; Northwest Highlands; San Francisco River Valley; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 02 at 10:25PM MDT until April 03 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Espanola Valley, Far Northwest Highlands, Northwest Highlands, Upper Rio Grande Valley, and San Francisco River Valley. * WHEN...From Noon to 9 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust will create reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Espanola Valley; Far Northwest Highlands; Northwest Highlands; San Francisco River Valley; Upper Rio Grande Valley
